Men can reduce premature baldness by maintaining a healthy diet rich in zinc and biotin, avoiding harsh hair treatments, managing stress, and using FDA‑approved topical minoxidil or oral finasteride as advised by a dermatologist (Minoxidil and Finasteride for Androgenetic Alopecia, 2023, J Am Acad Dermatol).

No, leprosy cannot be cured by touch; it requires a multi‑drug antibiotic regimen as prescribed in WHO guidelines (WHO Multidrug Therapy for Leprosy, 2020, WHO Guidelines) and demonstrated in studies such as Efficacy of Multidrug Therapy for Leprosy: A Systematic Review, 2019, JAMA Dermatology (https://jamanetwork.com/journals/jamadermatology/fullarticle/2758422).
In Canada it is illegal to marry a parent, child, sibling, grandparent, grandchild, aunt or uncle, or niece or nephew (Marriage Act, RSC 1985, c M‑1).

Antiperspirants can irritate the skin (Contact dermatitis from aluminum chlorohydrate, 2009, Contact Dermatitis), may contain aluminum compounds that some studies suggest could be linked to breast cancer or Alzheimer’s (Antiperspirants and breast cancer risk, 2018, Cochrane Database of Systematic Reviews; Aluminum and Alzheimer’s disease: epidemiology, 2020, Journal of Alzheimer’s Disease), and their environmental persistence raises concerns about pollution (Aluminum in personal care products and environmental fate, 2017, Environmental Science & Technology).

Yes, sharks can develop tumors, but documented cases are extremely rare and cancer incidence appears much lower than in other vertebrates (Cancer in Sharks, 2016, Nature Communications) – see https://doi.org/10.1038/ncomms13454.

There is no scientific evidence that powdered rhino horn can cure any medical condition; it is not recognized as a treatment by any reputable medical authority and its use is illegal in many jurisdictions and harmful to wildlife (World Health Organization, 2023, WHO fact sheet).

The detection of gravitational waves by LIGO in 2016 proved that they exist, a fact once doubted but now firmly established (Observation of Gravitational Waves from a Binary Black Hole Merger, 2016, Physical Review Letters).

Air is denser than water vapor under the same temperature and pressure, because the molar mass of dry air (~29 g mol⁻¹) is higher than that of water vapor (~18 g mol⁻¹) (e.g., Ideal gas law: ρ = PM/RT) (https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0003687012000287).
Yes—gravity still pulls the ISS toward Earth, but the station and its occupants are in continuous free‑fall, creating a microgravity (weightless) environment (NASA, “Gravity on the ISS”, 2024).

A 10‑foot shift (≈3 m) is only about 2 × 10⁻¹¹ of Earth’s 1.5 × 10⁸ km Sun‑distance, so the resulting change in solar flux is ≈4 × 10⁻¹¹, yielding a temperature swing of only ~3 × 10⁻⁹ K and an orbital‑period change of ~1 × 10⁻¹¹ s—completely negligible (e.g. see “Solar‑System Orbital Mechanics” (2019, *Celestial Mechanics*)).

No foods have been proven to cause type 1 diabetes; although studies have examined early infant feeding patterns, no causal link has been established (A review of environmental triggers of type 1 diabetes, 2019, Nature Reviews Endocrinology; Early infant feeding and type 1 diabetes risk: a systematic review, 2021, Journal of Pediatric Gastroenterology and Nutrition).
